title: Light Sans for law firm logo, any ideas?
author: heyhare

comments.content: I think it's **[Guardian Sans (Hairline)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123627/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=CommercialType%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Guardian%20Sans%20-%20Hairline&fid=5cb94acf0d5f0c6e6f98b7cd997c2daa&fsize=60&text=Serpe%20%2B%20Ryan&wrap=2)** by Paul Barnes and Christian Schwartz [2008, Commercial Type]
